Class TeamsCaptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.azure.android.communication.calling.CallCaptions
      • com.azure.android.communication.calling.TeamsCaptions

  • public final class TeamsCaptions
extends CallCaptions
    Teams captions for managing captions for a Teams Interop call.
